basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Generalist Senior Software Engineer with close to a decade of experience in the field. Highly passionate about CLIs, CI/CD, Automation and tooling.

work.name: Pleo
work.summary:
- Implemented infrastructure-as-code solutions using Terraform and GitHub Actions for managing blueprints, scorecards, automations, and self-service actions in Port, ensuring maintainability and scalability.
- Architected enterprise developer experience platforms including Port (software catalog), DX (engineering metrics), and Claude Code integrations, establishing infrastructure standards and operational excellence across 300+ engineering resources.
- Mentored other platform teams (Mobile, Frontend, Security) to help them establish a baseline of engineering standards through scorecards while acting as the main point of contact between teams and our vendor.
- Led and assisted with migrations of engineering SaaS tools (Internal developer portal, Engineering metrics) involving infrastructure-as-code refactoring, stakeholder communication, and minimal-downtime transitions impacting all engineering teams.
- Optimized CI/CD pipelines and automation workflows across 50+ repositories, reducing build times, standardizing dependency management with Renovate, and enabling self-service deployments through Port's orchestration platform.
- Architected enterprise AI tooling infrastructure using AWS Bedrock, implementing cost-tracked inference profiles and centralized configuration management enabling 200+ engineers to use Claude Code with zero configuration to support their development workflows.
- Resolved complex technical challenges through a rotation support role spanning Gradle dependency conflicts, GitHub OAuth integrations, Kubernetes deployments, API standards enforcement, and cloud infrastructure configuration to unblock teams and maintain system reliability.
- Created content as written and video guides to support the engineering onboarding process for new employees. Participated in several backend and tooling focused systems design interviews.

work.name: Pleo
work.summary:
- Play a key role in a special project to measure DORA metrics for the engineering organisation
- Revamp the bug triaging & prioritizing process involving customer support & engineering teams by measuring key metrics against SLAs
- Coach development teams to increase quality in their projects with better tooling and processes
- Advocate for quality in general in the company, with a focus on build pipelines and test driven development
- Participate in the development and implementation of tooling to help with quality automation
- Gather metrics across multiple systems (Source code management, Mobile device statistics, Project management tools) to help orient decisions for the quality team
- Coach development teams to increase quality in their projects with better tooling and processes
- Advocate for quality in general in the company, with a focus on build pipelines and test driven development
- Participate in the development and implementation of tooling to help with quality automation
- Gather metrics across multiple systems (Source code management, Mobile device statistics, Project management tools) to help orient decisions for the quality team

work.name: PremiumBeat (a Shutterstock Company)
work.summary:
- Led a small project to refactor a reporting tool to help measure test trends (pass/fail rate, changes in tests, etc.)
- Analyzed E2E testing frameworks and submitted propositions, implemented proof of concepts and bootstrapped new test projects with newer technologies
- Participated in company wide quality efforts to improve code quality in applications, provide better tooling and encourage better quality practices
- Advised from a technical standpoint during SoX audits
- Contributed to the optimization and maintenance of build pipelines (Jenkins) for various projects
- Participated in interview processes and helped new members of the team during their onboarding

- Used technical expertise and domain knowledge to advise various teams in the auditing process (Sarbanes-Oxley compliance)
- Participated in the quality and compliance aspects for the development of large scale web applications
- Used existing test architecture to maintain and develop testing frameworks (Cypress, TestCafe, Puppeteer, Selenium, Jest, Mocha)
- Proposed architecture improvements for test automation stack, experimented with proof of concepts and implemented new solutions to improve testing reliability
- Migrated and maintained existing CI/CD process for web apps (Jenkins, Docker)

work.name: Bell
work.summary:
- Created an Ansible playbook to automatically configure development VM environments with Java/Node, Eclipse, Maven and Git
- Managed multiple RHEL 7 servers and performed Linux systems administration tasks
- Built, deployed, configured and supported multiple applications using Docker and Docker-compose across multiple servers
- Evaluated DevOps and software development technological solutions and made recommendations
- Participated in software development projects using Java (Spring Boot, JHipster, Docker)
- Tested new technologies involving Linux containers and proposed solutions aligned with IT team objectives

work.name: Bell
work.summary:
- Participated in the design of a cloud architecture with OpenStack (Green field installation)
- Gained knowledge on the inner workings of OpenStack Neutron to advise senior Architects with their decisions
- Created a proof of concept web application to automatically deploy virtual firewalls in remote environments
- Developed web solutions using Python, HTML, and Twitter Bootstrap for automated VM deployment on VMware ESXi

work.name: Expertus Technologies
work.summary:
- Responsible for the application build process and build process improvement
- Performed various fixes in legacy versions of the application and assisted the quality assurance and support team during all stages of testing and deployment
- Developed software using J2EE, Struts, and Vaadin
- Provided bug fixing and level 3 support
- Automated builds with Maven and Bash
- Installed and configured a build server using Jenkins

- Participated in the development of a database module for an alert management software solution
- Tested existing code and fixed errors
- Implemented file-based database management with Java
- Performed unit testing in Java with JUnit

work.name: IBM Canada Ltd.
work.summary:
Summer job and internship, back to school from Sept 2010 to Jan 2011
- Scheduled down-time on a large array of production machines to apply fixes and updates to attached computers
- Deployed Windows XP Service Pack 3 manually on 700+ computers across a production line
- Programmed scripts to extract firewall rules from existing configuration files for migration to newer versions
- Provided level 1-2 technical support for production environments
- Deployed and managed Symantec Anti-virus on Windows XP systems
- Configured Symantec Endpoint Protection firewall rules
- Performed initial configuration on new computers and replaced faulty hardware components

education.institution: Université du Québec - Ecole de Technologie supérieure
education.summary: Bachelor's degree in IT engineering. This degree is oriented towards training generalist engineers that can understand and work with major technologies present in today's enterprises (development, systems administration, networking, administration, project management)
Activities and societies: Tutoring in programming and computer science courses
